EmailTemplate.name: Reassign Export Control Form Changed
EmailTemplate.subject: Action Required: Review Export Control Questionnaire
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
The Export Control Questionnaire for all listed Devices is reassigned to you by {!Device__c.OwnerFullName}. Please be reminded to fill in this form as soon as possible.
Notes from {!Device__c.OwnerFullName}: {!Export_Control_Form__c.Notes_to_New_Owner__c}
Please follow the link to review the document.: Link: {!$Label.Export_Control_URL_for_Emailtemplate}
#DEVICELIST#
Thank you.
NOTE: This is a system generated message. Please do not reply to this email.
